sentences.en: Barrow a large mound of earth or stones placed a burial site.
sentences.cn: 冢,古坟:在埋葬地上堆起的土丘或石丘.

sentences.en: Even her mother - in - law's grass - covered grave mound became a source of comfort.
sentences.cn: 再则,孩子也渐渐地大了,茅屋里,斜坡上, 总 荡漾着他们的嚷叫和笑声.

sentences.en: I found myself standing before a fireplace, warming my hands over a mound of glowing coals.
sentences.cn: 我不知不觉地站到了壁炉前, 拢着两手在一堆热烘烘的煤火上烤着.

sentences.en: In a moment, the four pirates had swarmed up the mound and were upon us.
sentences.cn: 转眼间, 这四个海盗就冲上了小山丘,向我们扑来.

sentences.en: It is an ancient burial - mound.
The children are playing on the mound.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在小土墩上玩.

sentences.en: The explorers climbed a mound to survey the land around them.
sentences.cn: 勘探者爬上土丘去勘测周围的土地.

sentences.en: The mound can be used as our screen.
sentences.cn: 这个土丘可做我们的掩蔽物.

sentences.en: The soldiers went at once to the mound and began to stick their bayonets through it.
sentences.cn: 士兵们马上赶到土丘处，开始用刺刀往里戳。

sentences.en: The table was a mound of paper and books.
Then instinctively his hand left the stone and rested upon the low mound of turf.
sentences.cn: 跟着,他不由自主的把手从碑上拿开,按在那一小堆草丘上.

sentences.en: There is a mound of papers on my desk.
sentences.cn: 在我的办公桌上有一大堆文件.

sentences.en: There's a mound of books on my desk.
This solution describes a spreading of a ground water mound.
sentences.cn: 这个解描述地下水丘的扩展.

phrases.tran_cn: 堆石防波堤；斜坡式防波堤
毛石堆；毛石基；堆石斜坡堤

trans.tran_cn: 土堆，土丘，堆，[考古学] 坟墩，[棒球] 投球区土墩
trans.tran_en: a pile of earth or stones that looks like a small hill
